00013 OR64PDHistDrawer::OR64PDHistDrawer(ORShaperShaperDecoder* histDecoder) :
00014 ORDataProcessor(histDecoder)
00015 {
00016   fShaperDecoder = histDecoder;
00017   
00018   app = new TApplication("OR64PDHistDrawer", NULL, NULL, NULL, 0);
00019 
00020   Tcanvas = new TCanvas("c1","ORCAroot Rate histogram");
00021   Ecanvas = new TCanvas("c2","ORCAroot Energy histogram");
00022   fEnergyHist = NULL;
00023   fRateHist = NULL;
00024   r3 = new TRandom3(0);
00025   gRandom = r3;
00026 
00027 }
00028 OR64PDHistDrawer::~OR64PDHistDrawer() 
00029 {
00030   if (r3 != NULL ) delete r3;
00031   if (Ecanvas ) delete Ecanvas;
00032   if (Tcanvas ) delete Tcanvas;
00033   if ( app ) delete app;
00034 }

00036 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode OR64PDHistDrawer::StartProcessing()
00037 {
00038   if(fShaperDecoder == NULL) {
00039     ORLog(kWarning) << "StartProcessing(): fShaperDecoder was NULL, can't proceed" << endl;
00040     KillProcessor();
00041     return kFailure;
00042   }
00043   return kSuccess;
00044 }
00045 
00046 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode OR64PDHistDrawer::StartRun()
00047 {
00048   //read in hist settings
00049   int lineNum=0;
00050   char line[196];
00051 
00052   ifstream histFile;
00053   histFile.open("Hist_Settings.txt");  //open a file
00054   //set defaults
00055   maxE = 100;
00056   threshold = 10;
00057   nbinsE = 200;
00058   maxT = 1800;
00059   fRefreshTime = 10;
00060    
00061   if(!histFile.is_open()) {
00062     ORLog(kWarning) << "Hist_Settings.txt file couldn't open, using defaults" << endl;
00063   } else {
00064     histFile.exceptions(ifstream::badbit);
00065     try {
00066       //first line is definition, then settings:
00067       histFile.getline(line, 196);
00068       lineNum++;
00069       histFile >> maxE >> threshold >> nbinsE >> maxT >> fRefreshTime;
00070       lineNum++;
00071       //check that values are in bounds
00072       if ( maxE < 0 || fRefreshTime<0 || maxT < 0 || threshold > maxE ) {
00073         ORLog(kWarning) << "StartRun(): Hist_Settings.txt file format incorrect, using defaults" << endl;
00074         maxE = 100;
00075         threshold = 10;
00076         nbinsE = 200;
00077         maxT = 1800;
00078         fRefreshTime = 10;
00079       }          
00080     } catch ( ifstream::failure fail) {
00081       ORLog(kWarning) << "StartRun(): Problem reading Hist_Settings.txt at line " << lineNum << endl;
00082     }
00083   }
00084   histFile.close();
00085   
00086   //read in energy calibration from file
00087   ifstream ecalFile;
00088   ecalFile.open("ecal_test.txt");  //open a file
00089   
00090   if(!ecalFile.is_open()) {
00091     ORLog(kWarning) << "StartRun(): Energy Cal file ecal_test.txt didn't open" << endl;
00092     fUseEcal = false;
00093   } else {
00094     UInt_t ecal_ca,ecal_ch, waste;
00095     Double_t ecal_s,ecal_s_e,ecal_c,ecal_c_e;
00096     ecalFile.exceptions(ifstream::badbit);
00097     lineNum=0;
00098     try {
00099       //first line is definition, then parameters:
00100       ecalFile.getline(line, 196);
00101       fUseEcal = true;
00102       while ( !ecalFile.eof() ) {
00103         lineNum++;
00104         ecalFile >> waste >> ecal_ca >> ecal_ch >> ecal_s >> ecal_s_e >> ecal_c >> ecal_c_e;
00105         if ( ecal_ca >8 || ecal_ca < 1 || ecal_ch >7) {
00106           ORLog(kWarning) << "StartRun(): Energy Cal has wrong number of cards or channels" << endl;
00107           fUseEcal = false;
00108           break;
00109         }
00110         ecal_slope[ecal_ca][ecal_ch]=ecal_s;
00111         ecal_slope_error[ecal_ca][ecal_ch]=ecal_s_e;
00112         ecal_constant[ecal_ca][ecal_ch]=ecal_c;
00113         ecal_constant_error[ecal_ca][ecal_ch]=ecal_c_e;
00114       }
00115       
00116     } catch ( ifstream::failure fail) {
00117       ORLog(kWarning) << "StartRun(): Problem reading ecal_test.txt at line " << lineNum << endl;
00118       fUseEcal = false;
00119       
00120     }
00121     
00122   }
00123   ecalFile.close();      //close it
00124 
00125   
00126       
00127 //reset histograms, deleted when file closed  
00128   if ( fEnergyHist != NULL) {
00129     fEnergyHist = NULL;  
00130   }
00131   if ( fRateHist != NULL) {
00132     fRateHist = NULL;
00133   }
00134   reset = 1;
00135   fLastDrawTime = 0;
00136   return kSuccess;
00137 }
00138 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode OR64PDHistDrawer::ProcessRecordTime(Double_t t_s)
00139 {
00140   time = t_s;
00141   return kSuccess;
00142 }

00144 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode OR64PDHistDrawer::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00145 {
00146   if(fEnergyHist == NULL && fUseEcal) {
00147     fEnergyHist = new TH1D("Energy","Energy Spectrum of 61 Pixels", nbinsE, 0, maxE);
00148     fEnergyHist->SetYTitle("Counts");
00149     fEnergyHist->SetXTitle("Energy [keV]");
00150   } else if (fEnergyHist == NULL && !fUseEcal ) {
00151     fEnergyHist = new TH1D("ADC","ADC Spectrum of 61 Pixels", 2048, 0, 2048);
00152     fEnergyHist->SetYTitle("Counts");
00153     fEnergyHist->SetXTitle("ADC Bin");
00154     
00155   }
00156   if(fRateHist == NULL) {
00157     fRateHist = new TH1D("Rate","Total Rate in 61 Pixels", maxT, 0, maxT);
00158     fRateHist->SetYTitle("Counts/sec");
00159     fRateHist->SetXTitle("Time [s]");
00160   }
00161   
00162   adc =  fShaperDecoder->ADCValueOf(record);
00163   card = fShaperDecoder->CardOf(record);
00164   channel = fShaperDecoder->ChannelOf(record);
00165 
00166   //Draw histograms every fRefreshTime seconds
00167   if ( ( time - fLastDrawTime ) > fRefreshTime ) {
00168     fLastDrawTime = time;
00169     Ecanvas->cd();
00170     fEnergyHist->Draw();
00171     Ecanvas->Update();
00172     Tcanvas->cd();
00173     fRateHist->Draw();
00174     Tcanvas->Update();
00175     // app->Run();
00176   }
00177   
00178   //don't draw events from low-gain pixels
00179   if ( card ==6&&channel==4 ) return kSuccess;
00180   if ( card ==6&&channel==6) return kSuccess;
00181   if( card == 5&&channel==4) return kSuccess;
00182 
00183   if ( fUseEcal ) {
00184     //convert adc to energy for each event
00185     /* adc values are already binned, correct for this by throwing random number */
00186     energy = (adc-ecal_constant[card][channel])/ecal_slope[card][channel];  
00187     ELow = (adc-0.5-ecal_constant[card][channel])/ecal_slope[card][channel];
00188     EHigh = (adc+0.5-ecal_constant[card][channel])/ecal_slope[card][channel];
00189     if ( EHigh < maxE && ELow > threshold ) {
00190       //reset rate histogram when run time exceeds hist limit
00191       if ( time > maxT ) {
00192         if (reset < time/maxT ) {
00193           reset++;
00194           fRateHist->Reset();
00195         }
00196         time -= (reset-1)*maxT;
00197       }
00198       
00199       upBin = fEnergyHist->FindBin(EHigh, 0, 0);
00200       lowBin = fEnergyHist->FindBin(ELow, 0, 0);
00201       if ( upBin == lowBin ) {
00202         //adc bin fully contained in an energy bin
00203         fEnergyHist->Fill(energy);
00204         fRateHist->Fill(time);
00205       } else {
00206         Double_t binEdge = fEnergyHist->GetBinLowEdge(upBin);
00207         Double_t Prob = (EHigh-binEdge)/(EHigh-ELow);
00208         Double_t RndNum = r3->Rndm();
00209         //determine which energy bin to incriment
00210         if( RndNum > Prob ) {
00211           fEnergyHist->Fill(EHigh);
00212           fRateHist->Fill(time);
00213         } else {
00214           fEnergyHist->Fill(ELow);
00215           fRateHist->Fill(time);
00216         }  
00217         
00218       }
00219     }
00220     
00221   } else {
00222     //reset rate histogram when run time exceeds hist limit
00223     if ( time > maxT ) {
00224       if (reset < time/maxT ) {
00225         reset++;
00226         fRateHist->Reset();
00227       }
00228       time -= (reset-1)*maxT;
00229     }
00230     
00231     fEnergyHist->Fill(adc);
00232     fRateHist->Fill(time);
00233   }
00234   
00235   return kSuccess;
00236 }
00237 
00238 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode OR64PDHistDrawer::EndRun()
00239 {
00240   if (fRateHist != NULL ) {
00241     fRateHist->Write();
00242   }
00243   if (fEnergyHist != NULL ) {
00244     fEnergyHist->Write();
00245   }
00246   return kSuccess;
00247 }
00248 
00249 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode OR64PDHistDrawer::EndProcessing()
00250 {
00251   // if a TFile is open, the histos will be deleted by the file. If not,
00252   // gDirectory will be named "Rint", and the histos will remain in memory.
00253   
00254   
00255   if(string(gDirectory->GetName()) != "Rint") return kSuccess;
00256   if (fRateHist != NULL ) {
00257     delete fRateHist;
00258     fRateHist = NULL;
00259   }
00260   if (fEnergyHist != NULL ) {
00261     delete fEnergyHist;
00262     fEnergyHist = NULL;
00263   }
00264   return kSuccess;
00265 }
